name: EasternEquineEncephalitisVirusDiseaseTestsForEasternEquineEncephalitisVirusAntigen
title: Eastern Equine Encephalitis Virus Disease (Tests for Eastern Equine Encephalitis Virus Antigen)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of selected Eastern Equine Encephalitis Virus antigens.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Eastern Equine Encephalitis),(Exclusion Criteria: - Panel tests, interpretation tests
- All other Arboviral conditions)
